empty.heading: su busqueda comienza aqui
empty.instructions: Use the form on the left to enter terms or phrases and search our publication database.

tips.heading: Search tips
tips.instructions: Smart Search takes all kinds of search inputs:
tips.tip1:
Find terms or keywords - to get the best search results, ''enter at least two terms at a time.'''
'This will make the search more precise, returning only the most relevant results.
tips.tip2: Paste a reference from an article
tips.tip3: Use a Journal name or part of a journal name
tips.tip4: Search on author name (or multiple authors)
tips.tip5: A title or part of a title (five or more words)

results.none: No results found. Try using different search terms or phrases to find what you're looking for.

refine.heading: Refine
refine.instructions: Check to limit results to only matching articles.

whatsNew.signUp: You can now sign up to be notified when new content is added by entering your email below. When new content is added we will automatically send you an email with a list of what was added, with links to it on PEP-Web!
whatsNew.help: The newest additions to our system can be viewed here.

login.title: Login
login.info: Este es el Psychoanalytic Electronic Publishing Archive database de textos completos. Esta disponible gratuitamente para todos para buscar, ver la tabla de contenidos y mirar resumenes. sin embargoused ndebera suscribirse para tener acceso a los articulos y libros completos.
login.error: Unable to login with the provided credentials.
login.genericError: Unable to login. There is a problem behind the scenes, and we are looking into it. Please try again later.

preferences.info: Customize the help provide by the PEP system below.

tour.title: Intro tour
tour.description: Turning this on will show you the tour the next time you visit PEP.

descriptions.title: Help descriptions
descriptions.description: Turning this on shows helpful descriptions when applicable.

icons.title: Help icons
icons.description: Toggling this will show/hide the help icons throughout the site. These icons have helpful hints and descriptions of functionality that will make your life easier.

preferences.title: Preferencias
preferences.info: Customize and personalize your PEP experience using the settings below.

web.title: PEP Web
web.description: This new PEP Web user interface has been designed to make it easier to search the PEP Archive more efficiently and effectively with maximum accessibility in mind, and to take advantage of the latest technology to personalize your user experience. This is just the first phase of an ongoing re-envisioning of the PEP Web system.. In the near future, we will use advanced AI techniques to help find information in the archive and take your research to new levels..

archive.title: PEP Archive
archive.description:
PEP Web has been designed to provide a powerful rapid search of the entire psychoanalytic literature in English, French, German, Greek, Italian, Romanian, Spanish and Turkish. It is the result of an innovative, high quality series of technical developments and a considerable financial and scholarly investment. You can ''read about the innovative developments required to produce and keep updating the PEP archive'' and read ''about the history of the PEP archive''. You can even ''suggest new content'' that you would like to see added to the PEP Archive. '

' For more information, see the ''PEP Web support pages''

activeSubscriptions.title: Active Subscriptions
activeSubscriptions.subscription: {product} from {start, date, short} to {end, date, short}

reportDataError.title: Report a Data Error
reportDataError.instructions1: Please do not use this form below to report access problems or for general support: instead use this ''customer service link''. Use this ''Report a Data Error form'' only to report DATA ERRORS (e.g. typing error, missing words, misspelled author name).
reportDataError.instructions2: If you see an inconsistency in names in the Author index, especially with your own entries, use the ''Author Index Correction form'' to request to harmonize the listings. If instead there's an error in author names in the article itself, such that it differs from the printed publication, report it as a data error below.
reportDataError.instructions3: PEP is very grateful for reports that help us to improve the quality of PEP-web. And we welcome ''suggestions for new content''.

form.title: Error Report
form.correctedTextHelp: You may also describe the problem and corrections.
form.errorVerification:
When there is an error in the original, we can fix obvious typographical errors only.'
'Please let us know if you have checked it against the original to verify it's an error on PEP-Web only.
form.explanationHelp: Please explain why you think this is an error on PEP-Web rather than the original.
form.authorOrPublisher: Are you the author or publisher?
form.authorOrPublisherHelp: In the case of errors in the original beyond typographical, we can apply publisher supplied changes.
form.originalCopy: Do you have a copy of the original paper?

clipboard.failure: There was an issue copying to the clipboard. Please try again later.

text.relatedBibliography:
This specific reference was not found to match any articles on PEP. However, using artificial intelligence, our software has found a reference which appears related, or may in some cases be a republication of the same article. '
'Disclaimer: This link is provided with the intent of possibly providing a relevant match where none would otherwise be provided. As it is by nature imprecise, and we are still refining the matching methods, not all references may actually be a close enough match to meet your needs'
'
text.error: Failed to load the document. Please contact a PEP administrator for assistance.

fourOhFour.subtitle: Page not found.
fourOhFour.message: The page you are looking for might have been removed, or is temporarily unavailable. ☹ Please try again later, or contact an administrator if the problem persists.

fourOhThree.subtitle: Access forbidden.
fourOhThree.message: Sorry, you do not have permission to access this page. ☹ Please contact an administrator if you think this is an error.

fiveHundred.subtitle: Something went wrong.
fiveHundred.message: It seems an unexpected error has occurred... we're really sorry about that! ☹ Please try again later, or contact an administrator if the problem persists.
